Title: Bangladesh’s RPGCL issues tender to buy three July-August LNG cargoes
Description: Bangladesh’s state-owned gas firm Rupantarita Prakritik Gas Co. Ltd. has issued a tender to buy three cargoes for delivery in July and August to Moheshkhali. The tender closes on June 25.
Author: CK

Title: Deutsche Regas gears up for start of Mukran LNG terminal with charter of second FSRU
Description: German LNG import terminal developer Deutsche Regas has signed an agreement with the German federal government to sub-charter the 174,000 m3 Transgas Power LNG vessel as a second floating storage regasification unit for its Mukran LNG receiving terminal, paving the way for the start of terminal operations at the end of this year.
Author: CK

Title: Equinor to take more LNG from Cheniere under new deal supporting Sabine Pass expansion
Description: Equinor has agreed to buy 1.75 mtpa of LNG from US LNG exporter Cheniere, doubling the volume that it will lift from the US LNG exporter’s liquefaction terminals and supporting the proposed Sabine Pass Liquefaction expansion project.
Author: CK
